token_integration.label: Token Integration
token_integration.comment: Only applicable for My Account card registration. If not enabled won't be used anywhere.

vendor.label: Vendor
vendor.comment: For both SERVER and DIRECT E-COMMERCE, and FORM transactions

vendor_tx_prefix.label: VendorTxCode Prefix
vendor_tx_prefix.comment: Sagepay transaction id prefix. Up to 5 alphanumeric characters.

connection_timeout.label: Connection Timeout
connection_timeout.comment: Time in seconds, eg: 60, default is 90

sagepay_notifications.label: Notifications
sagepay_notifications.comment: Enable/Disable SagePay monitor notifications as well as other Ebizmarts messages.

order_error_save.label: Halt order save
order_error_save.comment: DO NOT SET THIS TO YES UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING

send_basket.label: Send basket contents
send_basket.comment: Whether Basket (details of the customer's order) content is sent to Sage Pay

basket_format.label: Basket format
basket_format.comment: Basket XML. Supports fraud screening through ReD. Not compatible with Sage 50.

profile_request.label: Profile requests
profile_request.comment: Only frontend requests, debugging and performance checking only.

sync_mode.label: Sync from API
sync_mode.comment: Asynchronous means that data will only we updated every 5 minutes, for new orders within the last 24 hours, if Magentos cron is running. Choose this one if Sales > Order takes long time to load.

curl_verifypeer.label: Verify peer certificate
curl_verifypeer.comment: Set to No to stop cURL from verifying the peer's certificate.

layout_rewrites_active.label: Use Layout Rewrites
layout_rewrites_active.comment: Only for checkout problems, to remove JS files.

verify_cart_consistency.label: Verify cart consistency during transaction
verify_cart_consistency.comment: This will check if the customer has modified the cart while paying on another tab. Please note that the sole action of checking the cart on another tab will turn on this flag.

check_amounts.label: Check if amounts match
check_amounts.comment: This will check if the grand total and amount sent to Sage Pay match before saving the order in Magento.

apply_AVSCV2.label: Skip AVSCV2 Overseas
apply_AVSCV2.comment: If set to YES, SagePay won't apply post code nor address validation for overseas orders. (Only for United Kingdom, Isle Of Man, Guernsey and Jersey)

prevent_invoicing.label: Prevent invoicing
prevent_invoicing.comment: If set to YES, Magento won't create the invoice for Authorise and Capture payment action

selected_description.comment: The text to display when the customer select this payment method

allow_gift_aid.comment: Only of use if your vendor account is Gift Aid enabled.

vendor_email.label: Vendor Email
vendor_email.comment: If you wish to use multiple email addresses, you should add them using the : (colon) character as a separator. e.g. me@mail1.com:me@mail2.com

email_message.label: Email Message
email_message.comment: A message to the customer which is inserted into the successful transaction emails only. If provided this message is included toward the top of the customer confirmation emails.
